prog: (Haskell)a049320 n = a049320_list !! na049320_list = 0 : 0 : 1 : 0 : f [0,0,1,0] where   f xs = drop (length xs) ys ++ f ys where     ys = concatMap ch xs     ch 0 = [0,0,1,0]; ch 1 = [1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 14 2013
